snippet.title: Steel Sword Story PV English
snippet.description:
This is a game created using Pixel Game Maker MV, made especially for all the old school, classic 2D action game fans out there.

From 8bits Fanatics, the creator of the fatally difficult action title 1001 Spikes, comes a true 2D dark fantasy-action game full of swords and magic. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/978190/Steel_Sword_Story/
